node.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/amp
node.desc: A node for all Advanced Message Processing conditions and actions supported by an entity.

node.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/commands
node.desc: A node for all ad-hoc commands provided by an entity.

node.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#rooms
node.desc: A node for discovery of the rooms in which a user is an occupant.

node.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#traffic
node.desc: A node for discovery of the namespaces that are allowed in traffic sent through a room.

node.name: pubsub/nodes
node.desc: A "meta-node" for all pubsub nodes hosted by a publish-subscribe service.

node.name: x-roomuser-item
node.desc: A node by which a user can discover his or her reserved room nickname.
